title: Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub
description: The Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub™ brings innovation and convenience to your kitchen. This refrigerator offers a spacious 28 cubic feet of storage capacity, featuring a French door design for easy access to fresh food and a large full-width drawer for additional storage. The Family Hub™ technology includes a 21.5-inch touchscreen that allows you to manage your family calendar, view and share photos, control compatible smart home devices, and stream your favorite music. The Twin Cooling Plus™ system maintains optimal humidity and temperature levels to keep your food fresh for longer. Additional features include a built-in water dispenser, automatic ice maker, adjustable shelves, and a sleek stainless steel finish that complements any kitchen décor. Perfect for modern households looking for high functionality and stylish design.
meta_title: Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub
meta_description: Explore the Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub™. Features 21.5-inch touchscreen, Twin Cooling Plus™, water dispenser, ice maker, and more.

title: Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub and Water Dispenser
description: The Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub and Water Dispenser offers the perfect blend of advanced technology and convenience for your kitchen. With a generous 28 cubic feet of storage space, this French door refrigerator features a large full-width drawer, adjustable shelves, and a sleek stainless steel exterior. The Family Hub™ 21.5-inch touchscreen allows you to manage your schedule, view photos, play music, and control other smart home devices. The Twin Cooling Plus™ technology ensures optimal conditions for both fresh food and frozen goods, while the built-in water dispenser and automatic ice maker provide easy access to fresh water and ice. Ideal for modern kitchens, the RF28R7351SG combines high functionality with elegant design.
meta_title: Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub and Water Dispenser
meta_description: Get the Samsung RF28R7351SG 28 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub and Water Dispenser. Features 21.5-inch touchscreen, Twin Cooling Plus™, water dispenser, and ice maker.
